content.html: Lots of posts about don't speak to police - which is correct! But you must clearly and continuously say: "I request to speak with my attorney/court-appointed attorney." They will not give you an attorney if you do not ask for one. Your rights only work if you assert them.
content.value:
Lots of posts about don't speak to police - which is correct!

But you must clearly and continuously say: "I request to speak with my attorney/court-appointed attorney."

They will not give you an attorney if you do not ask for one. Your rights only work if you assert them.
